sections.heading: organization; suits against; designation
sections.text: In any action brought under sections 48-901 to 48-912, any labor organization may be sued in its own name and without identification of any of the persons who are its members.SourceLaws 1959, c. 231, ยง 9, p. 810;Laws 1983, LB 447, ยง 73.Cross ReferencesFor oth
